metadata.title: CVE-2022-2047 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In Eclipse Jetty versions 9.4.0 thru 9.4.46, and 10.0.0 thru 10.0.9, and11.0.0 thru 11.0.9 versions, the parsing of the authority segment of anhttp scheme URI, the Jetty HttpURI class improperly detects an invalidinput as a hostname. This can lead to failures in a Proxy scenario.

criterions.comment: jetty9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
